ResearchProjectDef.label: pipe organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft the pipe organs, an incredibly advanced and intricate stationary musical instrument.

ResearchProjectDef.label: noble decorations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build noble decorations like royal rugs, mirrors, grand chairs, imperial slabs, candelabras, and more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stellic throne
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the most grand, most beautiful stellic throne for your high ranking nobility.

ResearchProjectDef.label: janissary gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft janissary armor, light powered armor that’s commonly used by imperial recon troops. Note that these also require advanced components.
